"Or... perhaps they were deemed incapable due to their failures? Forgive me if I presume too much knowledge, but from what I've seen it appears that those who lose their Unique interfaces do so because they made some error of judgement or failed at some task."

"Could it be that the Clelestials only wish for the best of us to reach the surface?"
